title: LF players trying to get to gold in FLEX
body:
I am PLAT 5 in solo duo, but silver 2 in solo duo. I am an adc main, looking for other players that want to grind to gold with me. Add d0uglas and we will talk business. cya lata bro

EDIT: or messsage here

replies.body: Gold 1 solo G3 Flex... Support main
D5 in solo, unranked in flex. add me :)
Yo, im bronze in flex but silver 4 in solo/duo. IGN: Mokuto Bunshi I prefer top but can go adc and sup almost as well.
